text: Nakĩo kĩũngano gĩothe kĩa andũ a Isiraeli gĩkĩũngana kũu Shilo na gĩkĩamba Hema-ya-Gũtũnganwo kuo,18:1 Shilo nĩkuo gwatuĩkire itũũra rĩa maũndũ ma thirikari na ma ndini ma andũ a Isiraeli. Hema-ya-Gũtũnganwo yaikarire kũu nginya hĩndĩ ya Samũeli (1Sam 1–11) mbere ya gũthaamĩrio Gibeoni (1Maũ 21:29). tondũ nĩmarĩkĩtie gũtooria bũrũri ũcio ũgakorwo ũrĩ rungu rwao,
